Producer: Jennifer Chikes, Erin Gates, Jody Hill, Robbie Hill
Screenwriter: Jody Hill, Danny McBride, Ben Best
Synopsis: Fred Simmons (Danny R. McBride), a bombastic but hopelessly inept master of a strip-mall dojo, falls to pieces upon discovering his wife's (Mary Jane Bostic) infidelity. Hoping to rebuild his shattered self-respect, he sets out on a quest to meet his longtime movie idol, Chuck "The Truck" Wallace (Ben Best), star of the "Seven Rings of Pain" trilogy.
Title: The Foot Fist Way
